tool_description: This API will give you a new quote each day.
name: Daily Quote
title: Daily Quote

api_list.name: Get Daily Quote
api_list.description: It will give you a new quote each day.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-quote4.p.rapidapi.com/daily_quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-quote4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-quote4.p.rapidapi.com/daily_quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-quote4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
